# Nordic nRF Sniffer Firmware Mirror

This directory contains a mirrored copy of Nordic's nRF Sniffer for Bluetooth LE firmware package used by this project.

## Included artifact

- `nrf_sniffer_for_bluetooth_le_3.1.0_7cc811f.zip`
- SHA256: `9baa952e30ae736a5fd99ff8765934d5a2c10a328c022ae5b432aa589fe89495`

## License

This artifact is redistributed under the license provided by Nordic in `NORDIC_LICENSE.txt`.
The original copyright and permission notice are preserved.

## Upstream source reference

- Nordic tool page: https://www.nordicsemi.com/Products/Development-tools/nRF-Sniffer-for-Bluetooth-LE/Download
- Known direct artifact URL pattern used by scripts:
  - https://nsscprodmedia.blob.core.windows.net/prod/software-and-other-downloads/desktop-software/nrf-sniffer/sw/nrfsnifferforbluetoothle3107cc811f.zip
